articles.title: Covid: Fewer people using high street shops after Covid, retailers say - BBC
articles.description: The Welsh Retail Consortium says rising energy bills and inflation has made recovery harder.
articles.content:
Town and city centre shops are still struggling to recover from the pandemic, according to new figures. 
The Welsh Retail Consortium (WRC) says compared to pre-pandemic 2019 levels, total Welsh foot… [+2985 chars]
